nodes.text: Emperor's Hands were secretive operatives of the Galactic Empire that conducted their covert operations from VT-49 Decimators. At one point during the Imperial Era, a group of individuals were tasked with rescuing a prominent and outspoken celebrity and transport them to safety. When the individuals approached the celebrity, a VT-49 Decimator carrying one of the Emperor's Hands arrived and were tasked with ending the troublemaking subversive permanently.

In 2 BBY, Imperial Viceroy of Mandalore Gar Saxon, was the Emperor's Hand and led the Imperial Super Commandos, a group of elite Mandalorian warriors loyal to the Galactic Empire. Saxon was eventually killed during a skirmish on Krownest against Mandalorian Clan Wren.
